Change: Fix for PSL compiler: id constant? Property
Better 64bit code in Compiler for x86_64
Reading high order bit chars from terminal
Improvements to line breaking in output
Printing of chars with high order bit set
Increase default size of binding stack
Increase default size of symbol table
Extend special symbol table slots for single character ids from 128 to 256
Proper support for IEEE non-finite numbers (e.g. correct handling in equal and eqn)
BT/BSR/BSF Instructions for i386 and x86_64
Correct line breaking when printing bignums
Fix compiler bug for i386 and x86_64 when optimizing move to stack
Impose limit on id numbers in faslout
Allow for dump of binding stack on overflow
